name: Dreamers (itch) (Gmcarlheid)
description: Dreamers is a short puzzle-solving game created for the Epic Mega Jam 2022. This was a solo project where I challenged myself to make everything in the game except for the audio files. I originally wanted to create four puzzles, but only had time to include two in this version of the game. I may continue working on this and put the remaining puzzles into the game at a future date.
